title: Uniform Child-Custody Jurisdiction and Enforcement Act
context: PART III. ENFORCEMENT [ยง583A-301] Definitions. In this part: &ldquo;Petitioner&rdquo; means a person who seeks enforcement of an order for return of a child under the Hague Convention on the Civil Aspects of International Child Abduction, or enforcement of a child-custody determination. &ldquo;Respondent&rdquo; means a person against whom a proceeding has been commenced for enforcement of an order for return of a child under the Hague Convention on the Civil Aspects of International Child Abduction, or enforcement of a child-custody determination. [L 2002, c 124, pt of ยง2]
